title: Darren Hinton

description: Non essendo espertissima di web ho trovato grande supporto e sono riuscita a risolvere i problemi che riscontravo. Grazie davvero!! Ottimo tema, semplice e con tante possibilit√† di utilizzo.

title: Michael Leipper
subtitle: Edocuments
description: Joshua is knowledgeable on front-end technologies such as React which was used in the project. Joshua was constrained to working with a rest API that was written by Edocuments. He quickly and easily understood the relationship between the data entities that he has to work with on the front end which allowed him to complete his project.

title: Ronald Arias
subtitle: Software Team Lead | Qmee
description: We've had the opportunity to collaborate in different things, and I'm always left with a good impression. He's keen and willing to learn and would be a good addition to any team.
